title: Privacy policy for Liveeria , a SEO online consulting company.
snippet:
Hi, 

I'm currently in search for an experienced lawyer who can create a privacy policy for my business Liveeria. My business is based on providing SEO consulting services for property managers (locally) in NJ, or remotely anywhere in the US. I want an expert such as an experienced lawyer who can write a document that will protect my LLC business , and to legally allow it to collect personal data from users. 

I'm not fully aware of what's needed to create a privacy policy, so I would want an expert to question me on what activities my business will do, and the kind of customers I have to be legally covered.


Thank You,
Chris
